# List of ornithology awards

Anthus campestris. [[John Gould]]
This index provides a brief notable list of ornithology awards, recognizing achievements in the study of birds. It includes awards for both professional scientists and amateur birdwatchers. The list specifies the country of the sponsor organization, though some awards have an international scope and are not limited to one country.
